data.name: Dream Blinds, Inc.
data.address: 101 E Park Blvd 6th Floor, Ste 18, Plano, TX 75074

reviews.text:
Our realtors recommended Dream Blinds and we are so grateful for their recommendation!!  Dream Blinds was fantastic to work with!  Best prices around for quality products and quick turnaround!  They provided beautiful shutters and roller blinds for us and we couldn’t be happier!  The installation was performed quickly by their installer!

If you’re in the market for either/both, don’t hesitate to order yours from them!  Best prices in the metroplex!

We recently used Dream Blinds to have vinyl shutters installed in two windows in our home . From the first consultation all the way through to installation, they were friendly, prompt, professional, and efficient. It was only about a two-week turnaround time from the time the order was finalized to the installation. The shutters look amazing and appear well-made. We will definitely call them again when we’re ready to upgrade more of our window coverings!

I’m very satisfied with my new shutters. From the sales consultation and measurements to the installation, everything was professional and meticulous. If any friends ever need shutters, I will definitely recommend Dream Blinds.
From the very beginning it has been an excellent and seamless process.  Shutters are gorgeous! What a game changer. Pictures not the best to work being done in house.

The Dream Blinds team was amazing from start to finish! Everyone was super helpful and professional, and they guided me through every step of choosing and ordering custom my Roman shades. Communication was clear, delivery was on time, and the installation was flawless. The shades look stunning and completely transformed the space. Highly recommend for anyone looking for quality window treatments and top-notch service!

I was thoroughly impressed with the level of service I received from DREAM BLINDS! Their team was professional, courteous, and went above and beyond to ensure that I was well informed about the products I was purchasing. I chose Motorized Room Darkening Cellular Shades and Motorized Light Filtering Roller Shades. I LOVE THE TRANSFORMATION of my spaces! Thank you, Dream Blinds of Plano!

I was very pleased with the prompt service and support for installing Plantation shutters. Manufactured locally and hardware installed before installation. Installer very professional and quick installation process.
Great job. Stoney is wonderful, knowledgeable and curtious
